title: Angular Directive Options Schema
description: Creates a new Angular directive with .directive suffix

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the directive?

path.description: The path to create the directive.

prefix.description: The prefix to apply to the generated directive selector.

flat.description: When true, creates files at the top level of the project.

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new directive.

selector.description: The HTML selector to use for this directive.

skipImport.description: Do not import this directive into the owning NgModule.

export.description: The declaring NgModule exports this directive.

type.description: Adds a developer-defined type to the filename, in the format "name.type.ts".
